FFlagAXCatalogCategoryPillsShowAllCatego.mechanism: Adds an option to display all categories in the catalog using category pills.
FFlagAXCatalogCategoryPillsShowAllCatego.purpose: Allows players to easily browse through all available categories in the catalog.

DFFlagVoiceSdpCompressionSendSizeTelemet.mechanism: Tracks the size of compressed voice data sent over the network.
DFFlagVoiceSdpCompressionSendSizeTelemet.purpose: Improves voice chat quality by optimizing data transmission.

FFlagOnlyVisibleFramesAllowModal.mechanism: Restricts modal dialogs to only appear on visible frames.
FFlagOnlyVisibleFramesAllowModal.purpose: Enhances user experience by preventing modals from interrupting gameplay when not needed.

DFFlagWriteFlagCacheAfterDynamicFetch.mechanism: Updates the flag cache after fetching new data dynamically.
DFFlagWriteFlagCacheAfterDynamicFetch.purpose: Ensures players have the latest features and settings without delays.

FFlagLuauNoConstraintGenRecursionLimitIc.mechanism: Removes limits on recursive function calls in the Luau scripting language.
FFlagLuauNoConstraintGenRecursionLimitIc.purpose: Allows developers to create more complex and flexible scripts.

FFlagSduiComponentSkipParseLocalProps.mechanism: Skips parsing local properties for certain UI components.
FFlagSduiComponentSkipParseLocalProps.purpose: Improves performance by reducing unnecessary processing in the user interface.

FFlagRemoveRespawnShortcutFromRespawnCon.mechanism: Removes the quick respawn option from the confirmation dialog.
FFlagRemoveRespawnShortcutFromRespawnCon.purpose: Players must confirm respawning, reducing accidental respawns.

FFlagExtendLightRangeTo120HideRolloutPro.mechanism: Increases the range of light sources in the game to 120 units.
FFlagExtendLightRangeTo120HideRolloutPro.purpose: Enhances visibility and atmosphere in games by allowing lights to reach further.

DFFlagFixImageContentInvalid_Staged.mechanism: Addresses issues with loading invalid image content.
DFFlagFixImageContentInvalid_Staged.purpose: Improves the reliability of images displayed in games, ensuring a better visual experience.

FFlagPurchasePromptPriceShouldUseProduct.mechanism: Updates the purchase prompt to reflect the correct product pricing.
FFlagPurchasePromptPriceShouldUseProduct.purpose: Ensures players see accurate prices when buying items, preventing confusion.

FFlagFixTexturePackLoadingRetries_Staged.mechanism: Fixes the retry mechanism for loading texture packs.
FFlagFixTexturePackLoadingRetries_Staged.purpose: Improves the loading of textures, reducing errors and enhancing game visuals.

FIntOcclusionSolverInitialMaxSearchItera.mechanism: Limits the number of iterations for solving visibility in 3D space.
FIntOcclusionSolverInitialMaxSearchItera.purpose: Improves performance by reducing lag when rendering complex scenes.

FFlagStudioTasksFutureShareMutexes_Stage.mechanism: Implements mutexes for sharing resources between tasks in the Studio.
FFlagStudioTasksFutureShareMutexes_Stage.purpose: Enhances stability and efficiency when multiple tasks are running simultaneously.

DFFlagEnableCancelTouchesOnGameViewContr.mechanism: Allows touch inputs to be canceled when the game view controller is closed.
DFFlagEnableCancelTouchesOnGameViewContr.purpose: Prevents unintended actions when the game is paused or closed.

FFlagAXAddOverlayFocusHandlerToPurchaseL.mechanism: Adds a focus handler for overlay prompts during purchases.
FFlagAXAddOverlayFocusHandlerToPurchaseL.purpose: Improves accessibility by ensuring players can easily navigate purchase prompts.

DFIntLoadTestParticipationPerMillionUser.mechanism: Filters users for load testing based on a specified participation rate.
DFIntLoadTestParticipationPerMillionUser.purpose: Ensures a balanced and fair testing environment for game performance evaluations.

FFlagFixKeyboardFocusInfiniteLoop.mechanism: Fixes a bug that caused keyboard focus to get stuck in a loop.
FFlagFixKeyboardFocusInfiniteLoop.purpose: Ensures players can properly use their keyboard without interruptions.

DFIntVoiceChatHttpErrorsTelemetryThrottl.mechanism: Limits the frequency of reporting HTTP errors related to voice chat.
DFIntVoiceChatHttpErrorsTelemetryThrottl.purpose: Improves performance by reducing unnecessary error reports, enhancing voice chat reliability.

FFlagProductInfoBatchingCoalescingEnable.mechanism: Groups multiple product info requests into a single batch to reduce load.
FFlagProductInfoBatchingCoalescingEnable.purpose: Speeds up the retrieval of product information, making shopping smoother for players.

FFlagAXBackgroundSceneManagerRevamp3_Sta.mechanism: Updates the system managing background scenes for better performance.
FFlagAXBackgroundSceneManagerRevamp3_Sta.purpose: Enhances game loading times and overall visual experience for players.

FFlagLrMainMetrics.mechanism: Tracks key performance metrics for the platform more effectively.
FFlagLrMainMetrics.purpose: Helps improve the overall experience by identifying and fixing issues faster.

FFlagVideoGamePreviewSessionTracking_Sta.mechanism: Tracks player sessions during video game previews for analytics.
FFlagVideoGamePreviewSessionTracking_Sta.purpose: Helps developers understand player engagement in preview sessions.

FFlagLuauRefineDistributesOverUnions.mechanism: Improves type checking in Luau by refining types over union types.
FFlagLuauRefineDistributesOverUnions.purpose: Enhances code safety and reduces errors for developers.

FFlagMigrateEmptyResultsViewToFoundation.mechanism: Updates the display for empty search results to use a new framework.
FFlagMigrateEmptyResultsViewToFoundation.purpose: Provides a cleaner and more consistent look when no results are found.

FFlagLuaAppAddSchemaFieldsToGameClicks.mechanism: Adds new data fields to track game clicks in Lua applications.
FFlagLuaAppAddSchemaFieldsToGameClicks.purpose: Gives developers better insights into player interactions with games.

FFlagInternalExportHandleMisnamedR15Bone.mechanism: Fixes issues with exporting R15 character models that have incorrectly named bones.
FFlagInternalExportHandleMisnamedR15Bone.purpose: Ensures smoother character animations and model exports for developers.

DFFlagEnableGameJoinChatTimeoutEvent_Sta.mechanism: Triggers a timeout event if chat fails during game join.
DFFlagEnableGameJoinChatTimeoutEvent_Sta.purpose: Improves player experience by notifying them if chat is unavailable when joining a game.

FFlagFixTexturePackLoadingRetries.mechanism: Fixes the retry logic for loading texture packs.
FFlagFixTexturePackLoadingRetries.purpose: Ensures players can load textures more reliably, enhancing visual quality in games.

DFFlagRbxStorageRemoveOldCacheSkipEmpty.mechanism: Removes outdated cache files while skipping empty ones.
DFFlagRbxStorageRemoveOldCacheSkipEmpty.purpose: Frees up storage space, improving game performance for players.

FFlagVoiceChatClientRewrite_OneFlagToRul.mechanism: Consolidates voice chat functionalities under a single flag.
FFlagVoiceChatClientRewrite_OneFlagToRul.purpose: Streamlines voice chat features, making it easier for players to communicate.

FFlagAXExternalItemDetailsOverlay.mechanism: Introduces an overlay for displaying details of external items.
FFlagAXExternalItemDetailsOverlay.purpose: Enhances item browsing experience by providing more information at a glance.

FFlagReverbAbsorptionFieldFileFormat.mechanism: Changes how sound absorption data is stored for reverb effects.
FFlagReverbAbsorptionFieldFileFormat.purpose: Improves the realism of sound in games by enhancing how echoes and sound absorption are calculated.

DFFlagVoiceSdpCompressionSendSizeTelemet.mechanism: Tracks the size of compressed voice data sent over the network.
DFFlagVoiceSdpCompressionSendSizeTelemet.purpose: Helps improve voice chat quality by optimizing data transmission.

DFIntDataStoreOrderedSetFixedRequestLimi.mechanism: Sets a limit on the number of requests for data storage based on specific game places.
DFIntDataStoreOrderedSetFixedRequestLimi.purpose: Ensures smoother gameplay by managing how much data can be requested at once.

DFFlagWriteTombstoneAfterDynamicFetch.mechanism: Creates a 'tombstone' record after fetching dynamic data to manage data integrity.
DFFlagWriteTombstoneAfterDynamicFetch.purpose: Improves reliability of data retrieval, ensuring players have consistent game experiences.

DFIntVoiceChatHttpErrorsTelemetryThrottl.mechanism: Monitors and limits the frequency of voice chat error reports.
DFIntVoiceChatHttpErrorsTelemetryThrottl.purpose: Enhances voice chat stability by reducing unnecessary error notifications for players.

FFlagSelfieConsentDontMountUnused.mechanism: Prevents unnecessary mounting of selfie consent UI elements.
FFlagSelfieConsentDontMountUnused.purpose: Improves performance by reducing unused UI elements in the game.

FFlagFCDecrementVertexCount.mechanism: Reduces the number of vertices in certain graphical elements.
FFlagFCDecrementVertexCount.purpose: Enhances game performance and speeds up rendering for smoother gameplay.

FFlagLuauVectorLerp_Staged.mechanism: Implements a new method for smoothly transitioning between vector positions.
FFlagLuauVectorLerp_Staged.purpose: Allows for more fluid and natural movement animations in games.

DFFlagEditableMeshFastClusterSkipLoD.mechanism: Optimizes the loading of detailed mesh clusters by skipping lower detail levels.
DFFlagEditableMeshFastClusterSkipLoD.purpose: Faster loading times and improved visual quality for complex models in games.

FFlagAXEnableItemDetailsTryOnPage2.mechanism: Activates a feature to view detailed item information on a second page.
FFlagAXEnableItemDetailsTryOnPage2.purpose: Enhances the shopping experience by providing more information about items before purchase.

FFlagAXCategoryPillScrollToStart_Staged.mechanism: Adjusts the scroll position of category pills to start at the beginning.
FFlagAXCategoryPillScrollToStart_Staged.purpose: Improves navigation by ensuring users see the first category option immediately.

FFlagAXDisableCategoryPillsOnCatalogSear.mechanism: Removes category pills from the search results in the catalog.
FFlagAXDisableCategoryPillsOnCatalogSear.purpose: Simplifies the search experience by focusing only on search results without additional filters.

FFlagUIBloxFixModalBottomSheetSelectable.purpose: Enhances user interaction by making items easier to select in pop-up menus.

FFlagAXCategoryPillPadding.mechanism: Adjusts the spacing around category pills for better layout.
FFlagAXCategoryPillPadding.purpose: Improves visual clarity and accessibility by ensuring proper spacing between options.

FFlagRemoveiOS13DeprecatedCode.mechanism: Eliminates outdated code that is no longer supported in iOS 13.
FFlagRemoveiOS13DeprecatedCode.purpose: Ensures smoother performance and compatibility for players using newer iOS versions.

FStringTutorialUpsellPlaceId.mechanism: Enables a specific tutorial upsell feature by referencing a designated place ID.
FStringTutorialUpsellPlaceId.purpose: Helps new players discover and access tutorials more easily, enhancing their onboarding experience.
